name: Groundbreak: Extraction
description:
This metroid-vania game for PC was created using Game Maker Studio 2, Photoshop, Illustrator, Audacity and Magix Music Maker Premium from scratch in one month. Lead programmer: Owen Tessmer, Lead Audio: Tyson Greff, Lead Visuals: Eric Benz.

The game only works with a controller currently. It will be updated within the next 24 hours with keyboard controls.
